front.title: Unique Channel Bindings for IPsec Using IKEv2

abstract.t: This document specifies the unique channel bindings for IPsec channels constructed by connection latching, where the peers used the Internet Key Exchange protocol version 2 (IKEv2). New IKEv2 notification payloads are used to select an IKE_SA from which to derive the unique channel bindings for a given IPsec channel.
